about_the_game:
Background:
One day, for some reason, monsters appeared all over the continent. The sudden increase in a large number of monsters caught humans off guard.
In order to avoid greater casualties, people gathered in several large cities, holding on to the walls while accumulating strength.
Since then, the wilderness has become a paradise for monsters.
Years later, you're about to graduate from the Academy of Magic, and you're on the verge of patrolling the wilderness, observing the various conditions of the many monsters.

Introduction:
There are two classes, Warrior and Mage, which are divided into two types of skills: melee and ranged. As long as there is a corresponding weapon, the hero can use the corresponding skill. Because
Warriors and mages have different attributes, warriors use magic skills as well as mages, and mages use melee skills as well as warriors. Archers are not a profession,
However, it is possible to manually increase the attack stats of the bow and arrow.
The warrior's weapons are axes, halberds, spears, and swords, the mage's weapons are various styles of staffs, and there are four types of bows, all with different attributes. For example, melee weapons
Enhances the hero's melee attack and defense, and the staff enhances magic attack and defense.
Monsters within level 10 drop weapons used by level 1 heroes, monsters within level 20 drop weapons used by level 10 heroes, and so on. Weapons can be upgraded through the interface,
Use three methods: synthesis, strengthening, and upgrading to enhance basic attributes.
The main map is a large open scene, with different monsters in different areas, and there are two types: melee and ranged. Each type is divided into creeps, elites, and bosses.
Creeps are easy to defeat and rewarding. Elites and bosses are a bit more difficult, but the rewards are better.
Hero upgrades will strengthen the corresponding attributes according to the class, and increase movement speed at the same time. Each upgrade offers some free credits that can be manually enhanced for different attributes.
At levels 10, 30 and 50, one talent can be activated. Talents can be upgraded by consuming wealth, further enhancing the hero's abilities.
Teleportation points are placed on the scene to provide a faster way to move. The larger the number, the higher the level of the monster next to it.
You can manually click on the monster, if you are close enough, you can also click on the UI "monster" icon to automatically select one. You can tap the screen to send out attack skills.
It can also be sent out by clicking on the UI "Attack" icon. Melee skills can be comboed, click once, and send out the first skill action, and then when the action is almost halfway through
Click on the second click, and so on. There are about four combos for one skill.
Heroes can equip both melee and ranged weapons by clicking the UI "Switch" icon to switch between them. Equipped with a ranged weapon, melee weapons are two-handed only
Equip one, and one-handed can equip two.
Tap the "Life Potion" icon in the UI to replenish health. Tap the UI "Magic Potion" icon to replenish mana.
Tap the UI "Replenish Teammates" icon to consume mana, and all teammates, including yourself, will replenish health. Used when you have teammates in a team.
Monster drops are automatically picked up and divided into gold coins, diamonds, and items, with a certain randomness.
Support PC and Android platforms, in the same LAN, using high-end PCs as servers, and several ordinary PCs and Android as clients. Teammates can all be warriors, or
They are all mages, or they can all use bows and arrows, and different combinations produce different effects. There is also a benefit to teaming up, in addition to experience points, monster drops will be shared with
Each teammate accelerates the acquisition of wealth and weapons, making it easy to craft more and stronger weapons.
Each of the four heroes has three separate save slots, for a total of 12 saves. The first save for Hero A does not affect the first save for Hero B. No impact on each other.

Tips:
1. If your machine is a server, the configuration should be higher. The more connections, the higher the configuration of the machine should be.
2. If you have archives, uninstalling the software may also delete them. Updates should be overwritten installations.

name: Magic Patrol Envoy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7600K, or the same on AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650, 4 GB, or the same on AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: normal
  • VR Support: no
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9600K or better, or the same on AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or better, 8GB, or the same on AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: normal
  • VR Support: no
